thread.title: Whalen, Augustus need to get going for Lynx in WNBA Finals
thread.title_full: Whalen, Augustus need to get going for Lynx in WNBA Finals

author: wtopstaff
title: Whalen, Augustus need to get going for Lynx in WNBA Finals
text:
Home » News » Sports » Whalen, Augustus need to… Whalen, Augustus need to get going for Lynx in WNBA Finals By JON KRAWCZYNSKI October 5, 2015 4:15 pm In this Oct. 4, 2015, photo, Minnesota Lynx’s Lindsay Whalen brings the ball up court in the second half in Game 1 of the WNBA basketball finals in Minneapolis. Lynx coach Cheryl Reeve says the team has to get more out of stars Whalen and Seimone Augustus on offense as the WNBA Finals progresses. The Lynx trail the Indiana Fever 1-0 in the best-of-five series. (AP Photo/Jim Mone) 
MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — The Minnesota Lynx missed eight free throws, turned the ball over 15 times and were outscored by the Indiana Fever 22-12 on second-chance points to drop Game 1 of the WNBA Finals. 
Had they gotten production even close to what they’re used to getting from stars Lindsay Whalen and Seimone Augustus, they still might have been able to pull off the victory. 
Whalen and Augustus combined for 13 points on 4 for 14 shooting in the loss on their home court. 
Coach Cheryl Reeve was blunt after the game in assessing the poor play from the two veterans. On Monday, Reeve pivoted to defend Whalen, saying she is not getting the calls she should be getting from the officials. 
Game 2 of the best-of-five series is Tuesday night in Minneapolis. Topics:
